issue_name: Denial of Service Vulnerability in the OPC UA Server Implementations of Several Industrial Products

1.command: Update to V7.5 or later version
1.description: Update SIMATIC Energy Manager Basic to version 7.5 or later.

2.command: Update to V7.5 or later version
2.description: Update SIMATIC Energy Manager PRO to version 7.5 or later.

3.command: Update to V11.1 or later version
3.description: Update SIMIT V11 to version 11.1 or later.

4.description: Disable the OPC UA server in the affected product, if possible and OPC UA is not used.

5.command: Restrict access to the OPC UA interface
5.description: Restrict access to the OPC UA interface to trusted clients.
